title: Sunny, Spacious Victorian 2BR 1BA HW DW 2 Porches 1 Car BUS TO HVD 8/1
posting_body: PLEASE CALL 617-586-6222 WITH QUESTIONS OR TO SCHEDULE A VIEWING.
VIEWING CAN NOT BE SCHEDULED VIA EMAIL OR TEXT.
Sunny and spacious 2 bedroom unit located on the second floor of three family Victorian home.
The unit features high ceilings, refinished hardwood floors, and natural wood molding in most rooms.
There is a large living room, a formal dining room with a built-in hutch, and two large bedrooms.
The kitchen has been updated with white cabinets, dishwasher, disposal, refrigerator, and gas range.
Thre is an additional room ideal for a home office.
This unit has an large open-air back porch.
One off-street parking spot is included.
Heat is by gas and the tenant pays for all of their own utilities.
Very short distance to the 73 bus with service to Harvard Square.
Easy access to the river roads into Cambridge and Boston and to routes 2, 128, and the Mass Pike.
Sorry, no pets, and smoking is not permitted on the property.
Prices and availability are subject to change without notice.
Photos of managed buildings may be representative only and not of the actual unit available.
